text: The Comunità montana Evançon ("Evançon mountain community", in French Communauté de montagne Évançon) is an association of a total of 9 comuni in the Italian region of Valle d'Aosta. The headquarters of the mountain community are in Verrès. ==Purpose== Its main purpose is to promote the development of the valleys in the preservation of their cultural and environmental heritage. The main activities have been: * protection of alpine pastures (or Alpine tundra) * development of tourism ==Geography== These comuni are in the eastern part of Valle d'Aosta. The Comunità is named after the Evançon river that flows through the Val d'Ayas and is a left tributary of the Dora Baltea river, which flows through the "Comunità". The Comunità montana Evançon has a total area of about and a population of 11,617; its population density is of inhabitants/km2. ==Comuni== The following comuni are part of the Comunità: Comuni Population (2013) Area (km²) Density (Inh./km²) 1 Arnad 1,298 28.73 2 Ayas 1,397 129.90 3 Brusson 874 55.31 4 Challand-Saint-Anselme 769 27.84 5 Challand-Saint-Victor 594 25.27 6 Champdepraz 718 48.49 7 Issogne 1,416 23.77 8 Montjovet 1,817 18.73 9 Verrès 2,734 8.21 ==References== ==Related pages== * Valle d'Aosta ==Other websites== * The National Union of Mountain Towns and Communities - UNCEM * Comuniverso: le 211 Comunità montane * Comunità Montana dell'Evançon * Guida Rurale della Valle d'Aosta. Comunità Montana Evançon Category:Italian mountain communities
title: Comunità montana Evançon
